CustomField.description: Value used to update a specified PSA project field when a Jira issue is set to a specified status.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the Map PSA Projects to Jira Issues field is selected, determines the value with which the mapped project field is updated when a Jira issue has the status defined in Jira Issue Status Category. This value is case-sensitive.
CustomField.label: PSA Field Value for Updating Projects
